availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Used as an unofficial designation starting on August 21, 1862. Composed of troops from the Department of East Tennessee engaged in the Fall 1862 Kentucky campaign. Also known as the Army of Kentucky after August 28, 1862. This Army was designated Smith’s Corps of the Army of Tennessee on November 20, 1862. Commander(s): Edmund Kirby Smith.

bibl.p: Lawrence Lee Hewitt and Arthur W. Bergeron, Jr., Confederate Generals in the Western Theatre, vol. 3, Essays on America’s Civil War (Knoxville: The University of Tennessee Press, 2011), 279.
